pokedex_entries.black: It generates a powerful, freezing energy inside itself, but its body became frozen when the energy leaked out.
pokedex_entries.white: It can produce ultracold air. Its body is frozen.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: This legendary ice Pokémon waits for a hero to fill in the missing parts of its body with truth or ideals.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: This legendary ice Pokémon waits for a hero to fill in the missing parts of its body with truth or ideals.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: It generates a powerful, freezing energy inside itself, but its body became frozen when the energy leaked out.
pokedex_entries.sword: Dwelling within it is a power even greater than that of Reshiram or Zekrom, but the extreme cold keeps that power bound.
pokedex_entries.shield: It appears that this Pokémon uses its powers over ice to freeze its own body in order to stabilize its cellular structure.

pokedex_entries.black: This ominous Pokémon is feared. Through cities it wanders, searching for the spirits of the fallen.
pokedex_entries.white: It arrives near the moment of death and steals spirit from the body.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: The spirits it absorbs fuel its baleful fire. It hangs around hospitals waiting for people to pass on.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: The spirits it absorbs fuel its baleful fire. It hangs around hospitals waiting for people to pass on.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: It arrives near the moment of death and steals spirit from the body.
pokedex_entries.sword: This Pokémon appears just before someone passes away, so it’s feared as an emissary of death.
pokedex_entries.shield: It lurks in cities, pretending to be a lamp. Once it finds someone whose death is near, it will trail quietly after them.

pokedex_entries.black: Lands visited by Landorus grant such bountiful crops that it has been hailed as “The Guardian of the Fields.”
pokedex_entries.white: The energy that comes pouring from its tail increases the nutrition in the soil, making crops grow to great size.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: From the forces of lightning and wind, it creates energy to give nutrients to the soil and make the land abundant.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: Lands visited by Landorus grant such bountiful crops that it has been hailed as “The Guardian of the Fields.”
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: From the forces of lightning and wind, it creates energy to give nutrients to the soil and make the land abundant.
pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: When the incarnations of wind and of lightning clash, Landorus arrives to quell the conflict. After the tempests and thunderbolts abate, the land is sure to be blessed with bountiful harvests.

pokedex_entries.black: This Pokémon was believed to have been born from the sun. When it evolves, its entire body is engulfed in flames.
pokedex_entries.white: The base of volcanoes is where they make their homes. They shoot fire from their five horns to repel attacking enemies.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Said to have been born from the sun, it spews fire from its horns and encases itself in a cocoon of fire when it evolves.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: Said to have been born from the sun, it spews fire from its horns and encases itself in a cocoon of fire when it evolves.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: The base of volcanoes is where they make their homes. They shoot fire from their five horns to repel attacking enemies.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: When battling opponents, it sprays fire from its five horns. The max temperature of the flames can reach nearly 5,500 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: It protects itself with flame. Long years ago, people believed Larvesta had a nest on the sun.
pokedex_entries.sword: The people of ancient times believed that Larvesta fell from the sun.
pokedex_entries.shield: Larvesta’s body is warm all over. It spouts fire from the tips of its horns to intimidate predators and scare prey.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: This Pokémon was called the Larva That Stole the Sun. The fire Larvesta spouts from its horns can cut right through a sheet of iron.
pokedex_entries.violet: In ancient times, Larvesta was worshiped as the emissary of the sun. However, it was also viewed as a burden since it often caused forest fires.

pokedex_entries.black: Upon finding a small Pokémon, it weaves clothing for it from leaves, using the cutters on its arms and sticky silk.
pokedex_entries.white: It keeps its eggs warm with heat from fermenting leaves. It also uses leaves to make warm wrappings for Sewaddle.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Upon finding a small Pokémon, it weaves clothing for it from leaves by using the sticky silk secreted from its mouth.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: Upon finding a small Pokémon, it weaves clothing for it from leaves by using the sticky silk secreted from its mouth.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: It keeps its eggs warm with heat from fermenting leaves. It also uses leaves to make warm wrappings for Sewaddle.

pokedex_entries.black: These Pokémon vanish and appear unexpectedly. Many Trainers are drawn to their beautiful form and fur.
pokedex_entries.white: Stealthily, it sneaks up on its target, striking from behind before its victim has a chance to react.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Their beautiful form comes from the muscles they have developed. They run silently in the night.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: Their beautiful form comes from the muscles they have developed. They run silently in the night.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: Stealthily, it sneaks up on its target, striking from behind before its victim has a chance to react.
pokedex_entries.sword: Don’t be fooled by its gorgeous fur and elegant figure. This is a moody and vicious Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.shield: This stealthy Pokémon sneaks up behind prey without making any sound at all. It competes with Thievul for territory.

pokedex_entries.black: Even veteran Trainers face a challenge in getting its beautiful flower to bloom. This Pokémon is popular with celebrities.
pokedex_entries.white: The fragrance of the garland on its head has a relaxing effect. It withers if a Trainer does not take good care of it.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: The fragrance of the garland on its head has a relaxing effect, but taking care of it is very difficult.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: The fragrance of the garland on its head has a relaxing effect. It withers if a Trainer does not take good care of it.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: Even veteran Trainers face a challenge in getting its beautiful flower to bloom. This Pokémon is popular with celebrities.
pokedex_entries.sun: No matter how much time and money is spent raising it, its flowers are the most beautiful when they bloom in the wild.
pokedex_entries.moon: As soon as it finds a male to be its partner, the beautiful flower on its head darkens, droops, and withers away.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: The fragrance of its flower differs slightly depending on the soil where it grew up. Sniffing the aroma calms your heart and mind.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: It’s well liked by other Pokémon because of its beauty. The flower on its head needs constant care, or it will soon wither and rot.
pokedex_entries.sword: It’s believed that even first-rate gardeners have a hard time getting the flower on a Lilligant’s head to bloom.
pokedex_entries.shield: Essential oils made from Lilligant flowers have a sublime scent, but they’re also staggeringly expensive.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: The fragrance of the garland on its head has a relaxing effect, but taking care of it is very difficult.
pokedex_entries.violet: No matter how much time and money is spent raising it, its flowers are the most beautiful when they bloom in the wild.

pokedex_entries.black: It faces strong opponents with great courage. But, when at a disadvantage in a fight, this intelligent Pokémon flees.
pokedex_entries.white: The long hair around its face provides an amazing radar that lets it sense subtle changes in its surroundings.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Though it is a very brave Pokémon, it’s also smart enough to check its foe’s strength and avoid battle.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: The long hair around its face provides an amazing radar that lets it sense subtle changes in its surroundings.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: Though it is a very brave Pokémon, it’s also smart enough to check its foe’s strength and avoid battle.
pokedex_entries.sun: Because it doesn’t yelp, it’s extremely popular with Trainers who live in apartment buildings.
pokedex_entries.moon: The long fur surrounding its face functions as radar, enabling it to probe the condition of its battle opponents.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: This Pokémon has excellent judgment. If it decides it can’t defeat an opponent, it immediately turns tail and vamooses.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: This Pokémon is popular with beginners because it’s intelligent, obedient to its Trainer’s commands, and easy to raise.
pokedex_entries.sword: This Pokémon is courageous but also cautious. It uses the soft fur covering its face to collect information about its surroundings.
pokedex_entries.shield: This Pokémon is far brighter than the average child, and Lillipup won’t forget the love it receives or any abuse it suffers.

pokedex_entries.black: Litwick shines a light that absorbs the life energy of people and Pokémon, which becomes the fuel that it burns.
pokedex_entries.white: While shining a light and pretending to be a guide, it leeches off the life force of any who follow it.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Its flame is usually out, but it starts shining when it absorbs life force from people or Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: While shining a light and pretending to be a guide, it leeches off the life force of any who follow it.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: Litwick shines a light that absorbs the life energy of people and Pokémon, which becomes the fuel that it burns.
pokedex_entries.sword: The flame on its head keeps its body slightly warm. This Pokémon takes lost children by the hand to guide them to the spirit world.
pokedex_entries.shield: The younger the life this Pokémon absorbs, the brighter and eerier the flame on its head burns.

pokedex_entries.black: It makes a nest out of bones it finds. It grabs weakened prey in its talons and hauls it to its nest of bones.
pokedex_entries.white: Watching from the sky, they swoop to strike weakened Pokémon on the ground. They decorate themselves with bones.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: They fly in circles around the sky. When they spot prey, they attack and carry it back to their nest with ease.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: They fly in circles around the sky. When they spot prey, they attack and carry it back to their nest with ease.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: Watching from the sky, they swoop to strike weakened Pokémon on the ground. They decorate themselves with bones.
pokedex_entries.sun: They adorn themselves beautifully with bones. This is supposedly an effort to attract males, but no male Mandibuzz have ever been found.
pokedex_entries.moon: It circles in the sky, keeping a keen eye out for Pokémon in a weakened state. Its choicest food is Cubone.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: It skillfully arranges the bones of its prey to construct its nest. Most of the bones are Cubone.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: It’s always searching for food for Vullaby. When it finds a weak Pokémon, Mandibuzz swoops it right off to its nest.
pokedex_entries.sword: Although it’s a bit of a ruffian, this Pokémon will take lost Vullaby under its wing and care for them till they’re ready to leave the nest.
pokedex_entries.shield: They adorn themselves with bones. There seem to be fashion trends among them, as different bones come into and fall out of popularity.

pokedex_entries.black: It uses an up-tempo song and dance to drive away the bird Pokémon that prey on its flower seeds.
pokedex_entries.white: Arid regions are their habitat. They move rhythmically, making a sound similar to maracas.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: When it moves rhythmically, it makes a sound similar to maracas, making the surprised Pokémon flee.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: It uses an up-tempo song and dance to drive away the bird Pokémon that prey on its flower seeds.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: Arid regions are their habitat. They move rhythmically, making a sound similar to maracas.
pokedex_entries.sword: With noises that could be mistaken for the rattles of maracas, it creates an upbeat rhythm, startling bird Pokémon and making them fly off in a hurry.
pokedex_entries.shield: Once each year, this Pokémon scatters its seeds. They’re jam-packed with nutrients, making them a precious food source out in the desert.

pokedex_entries.black: Its melodies are sung with a special vocalization method that can control the feelings of those who hear it.
pokedex_entries.white: Many famous songs have been inspired by the melodies that Meloetta plays.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: The melodies sung by Meloetta have the power to make Pokémon that hear them happy or sad.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: The melodies sung by Meloetta have the power to make Pokémon that hear them happy or sad.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: Its melodies are sung with a special vocalization method that can control the feelings of those who hear it.

pokedex_entries.black: In fights, they dominate with onslaughts of flowing, continuous attacks. With their sharp claws, they cut enemies.
pokedex_entries.white: They have mastered elegant combos. As they concentrate, their battle moves become swifter and more precise.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: It takes pride in the speed at which it can use moves. What it loses in power, it makes up for in quantity.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: It takes pride in the speed at which it can use moves. What it loses in power, it makes up for in quantity.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: In fights, they dominate with onslaughts of flowing, continuous attacks. With their sharp claws, they cut enemies.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: They can often be seen in packs in the morning, slowly moving their bodies through a series of poses.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: They seclude themselves in the mountains and devote themselves to training. The form of their kicks and chops differs from pack to pack.
pokedex_entries.sword: In one minute, a well-trained Mienfoo can chop with its arms more than 100 times.
pokedex_entries.shield: Though small, Mienfoo’s temperament is fierce. Any creature that approaches Mienfoo carelessly will be greeted with a flurry of graceful attacks.

pokedex_entries.black: It wields the fur on its arms like a whip. Its arm attacks come with such rapidity that they cannot even be seen.
pokedex_entries.white: They use the long fur on their arms as a whip to strike their opponents.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Using the long fur on its arms like whips, it launches into combo attacks that, once started, no one can stop.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: It wields the fur on its arms like a whip. Its arm attacks come with such rapidity that they cannot even be seen.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: Using the long fur on its arms like whips, it launches into combo attacks that, once started, no one can stop.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: It overwhelms its opponents with continuous attacks and then slowly stores up power before delivering the finishing blow.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: When Mienshao lets out a bizarre wail, you’re in danger. A flurry of kicks and chops too fast to see is about to be unleashed!
pokedex_entries.sword: When Mienshao comes across a truly challenging opponent, it will lighten itself by biting off the fur on its arms.
pokedex_entries.shield: Delivered at blinding speeds, kicks from this Pokémon can shatter massive boulders into tiny pieces.

pokedex_entries.black: They greet one another by rubbing each other with their tails, which are always kept well groomed and clean.
pokedex_entries.white: These Pokémon prefer a tidy habitat. They are always sweeping and dusting, using their tails as brooms.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Minccino greet each other by grooming one another thoroughly with their tails.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: Minccino greet each other by grooming one another thoroughly with their tails.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: These Pokémon prefer a tidy habitat. They are always sweeping and dusting, using their tails as brooms.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: A clean freak that will not allow even the slightest mess, it uses its tail like a mop to thoroughly clean any and all filth.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: When its tail has gotten dirty from self-cleaning or from cleaning its nest, Minccino spends a whole day washing its tail in clean spring water.
pokedex_entries.sword: The way it brushes away grime with its tail can be helpful when cleaning. But its focus on spotlessness can make cleaning more of a hassle.
pokedex_entries.shield: They pet each other with their tails as a form of greeting. Of the two, the one whose tail is fluffier is a bit more boastful.

pokedex_entries.black: Munna always float in the air. People whose dreams are eaten by them forget what the dreams had been about.
pokedex_entries.white: It eats the dreams of people and Pokémon. When it eats a pleasant dream, it expels pink-colored mist.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: This Pokémon appears before people and Pokémon who are having nightmares and eats those dreams.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: This Pokémon appears before people and Pokémon who are having nightmares and eats those dreams.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: It eats the dreams of people and Pokémon. When it eats a pleasant dream, it expels pink-colored mist.
pokedex_entries.sword: Late at night, it appears beside people’s pillows. As it feeds on dreams, the patterns on its body give off a faint glow.
pokedex_entries.shield: It eats dreams and releases mist. The mist is pink when it’s eating a good dream, and black when it’s eating a nightmare.

pokedex_entries.black: The mist emanating from their foreheads is packed with the dreams of people and Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.white: With the mist from its forehead, it can create shapes of things from dreams it has eaten.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: The dream mist coming from its forehead changes into many different colors depending on the dream that was eaten.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: The mist emanating from their foreheads is packed with the dreams of people and Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: The dream mist coming from its forehead changes into many different colors depending on the dream that was eaten.
pokedex_entries.sword: When dark mists emanate from its body, don’t get too near. If you do, your nightmares will become reality.
pokedex_entries.shield: It drowses and dreams all the time. It’s best to leave it be if it’s just woken up, as it’s a terrible grump when freshly roused from sleep.

pokedex_entries.black: It fights using the scalchop on its stomach. In response to an attack, it retaliates immediately by slashing.
pokedex_entries.white: The scalchop on its stomach is made from the same elements as claws. It detaches the scalchop for use as a blade.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: The scalchop on its stomach isn’t just used for battle--it can be used to break open hard berries as well.
pokedex_entries.x: The scalchop on its stomach isn’t just used for battle--it can be used to break open hard berries as well.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: It fights using the scalchop on its stomach. In response to an attack, it retaliates immediately by slashing.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: The scalchop on its stomach isn’t just used for battle—it can be used to break open hard berries as well.
pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: This Pokémon from the Unova region uses the shell on its belly as a weapon to cut down its foes. Thus, I’ve conferred upon this shell the name “scalchop.”

pokedex_entries.black: When they vibrate the bumps on their heads, they can make waves in water or earthquake-like vibrations on land.
pokedex_entries.white: It lives in the water and on land. It uses its long, sticky tongue to capture prey.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: It lives in the water and on land. It uses its long, sticky tongue to immobilize its opponents.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: When they vibrate the bumps on their heads, they can make waves in water or earthquake-like vibrations on land.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: It lives in the water and on land. It uses its long, sticky tongue to immobilize its opponents.
pokedex_entries.sword: It weakens its prey with sound waves intense enough to cause headaches, then entangles them with its sticky tongue.
pokedex_entries.shield: On occasion, their cries are sublimely pleasing to the ear. Palpitoad with larger lumps on their bodies can sing with a wider range of sounds.

pokedex_entries.black: The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. Plants that receive its water grow large.
pokedex_entries.white: It does not thrive in dry environments. It keeps itself damp by shooting water stored in its head tuft from its tail.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. It waters plants with it using its tail.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. It waters plants with it using its tail.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. Plants that receive its water grow large.

pokedex_entries.black: This Pokémon dwells deep in the forest. Eating a leaf from its head whisks weariness away as if by magic.
pokedex_entries.white: It shares the leaf on its head with weary-looking Pokémon. These leaves are known to relieve stress.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: It’s good at finding berries and gathers them from all over. It’s kind enough to share them with friends.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: It shares the leaf on its head with weary-looking Pokémon. These leaves are known to relieve stress.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: It’s good at finding berries and gathers them from all over. It’s kind enough to share them with friends.

pokedex_entries.black: When it is angered, the temperature of its head tuft reaches 600° F. It uses its tuft to roast berries.
pokedex_entries.white: This Pokémon lives in caves in volcanoes. The fire within the tuft on its head can reach 600° F.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Very intelligent, it roasts berries before eating them. It likes to help people.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: Very intelligent, it roasts berries before eating them. It likes to help people.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: This Pokémon lives in caves in volcanoes. The fire within the tuft on its head can reach 600 degrees Fahrenheit.

pokedex_entries.black: Using food stored in cheek pouches, they can keep watch for days. They use their tails to communicate with others.
pokedex_entries.white: Extremely cautious, they take shifts to maintain a constant watch of their nest. They feel insecure without a lookout.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Extremely cautious, one of them will always be on the lookout, but it won’t notice a foe coming from behind.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: Using food stored in cheek pouches, they can keep watch for days. They use their tails to communicate with others.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: Extremely cautious, one of them will always be on the lookout, but it won’t notice a foe coming from behind.

pokedex_entries.black: Blades comprise this Pokémon’s entire body. If battling dulls the blades, it sharpens them on stones by the river.
pokedex_entries.white: They fight at Bisharp’s command. They cling to their prey and inflict damage by sinking their blades into it.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Ignoring their injuries, groups attack by sinking the blades that cover their bodies into their prey.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: Blades comprise this Pokémon’s entire body. If battling dulls the blades, it sharpens them on stones by the river.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: Ignoring their injuries, groups attack by sinking the blades that cover their bodies into their prey.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: After shredding its prey, it sharpens its blades on a stone by the river. Each Pawniard has its own favorite sharpening stone.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: It follows Bisharp’s orders to a tee when it attacks enemies. After slashing an opponent, Pawniard clangs both of its blades together.
pokedex_entries.sword: It uses river stones to maintain the cutting edges of the blades covering its body. These sharpened blades allow it to bring down opponents.
pokedex_entries.shield: A pack of these Pokémon forms to serve a Bisharp boss. Each Pawniard trains diligently, dreaming of one day taking the lead.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: Pawniard will fearlessly challenge even powerful foes. In a pinch, it will cling to opponents and pierce them with the blades all over its body.
pokedex_entries.violet: Any chips in its blades would prove fatal for it. After each battle, it diligently maintains its blades using its favorite sharpening stone.

pokedex_entries.black: The leaves on its head are very bitter. Eating one of these leaves is known to refresh a tired body.
pokedex_entries.white: Since they prefer moist, nutrient-rich soil, the areas where Petilil live are known to be good for growing plants.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: The leaves on its head grow right back even if they fall out. These bitter leaves refresh those who eat them.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: The leaves on its head are very bitter. Eating one of these leaves is known to refresh a tired body.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: Since they prefer moist, nutrient-rich soil, the areas where Petilil live are known to be good for growing plants.
pokedex_entries.sun: Although the leaves on its head are bitter enough to cause dizziness, they provide relief from weariness—even more so when boiled.
pokedex_entries.moon: By pruning the leaves on its head with regularity, this Pokémon can be grown into a fine plump shape.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: Some say if you dry the leaves on its head, boil them down, and drink the infusion, your vigor will return, so Petilil is popular with the elderly.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: They prefer clean water and soil. When the environment they live in turns bad, the whole bunch will up and move to a new area.
pokedex_entries.sword: Petilil appears around sources of clean water. Boiling leaves from this Pokémon’s head results in a liquid that’s sometimes used as a bug repellent.
pokedex_entries.shield: The deeper the color of a Petilil’s leaves, the healthier the Pokémon is. Petilil sometimes makes its home in a well-tended field or flowerbed.
pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: The leaves on its head are highly valued for medicinal purposes. Dry the leaves in the sun, boil them, and then drink the bitter decoction for remarkably effective relief from fatigue.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: The leaves on its head grow right back even if they fall out. These bitter leaves refresh those who eat them.
pokedex_entries.violet: If the leaves on its head are pruned with regularity, this Pokémon can be grown into a fine plump shape.

pokedex_entries.black: Each follows its Trainer’s orders as best it can, but they sometimes fail to understand complicated commands.
pokedex_entries.white: These Pokémon live in cities. They are accustomed to people. Flocks often gather in parks and plazas.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: This very forgetful Pokémon will wait for a new order from its Trainer even though it already has one.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: This very forgetful Pokémon will wait for a new order from its Trainer even though it already has one.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: These Pokémon live in cities. They are accustomed to people. Flocks often gather in parks and plazas.
pokedex_entries.sword: Where people go, these Pokémon follow. If you’re scattering food for them, be careful— several hundred of them can gather at once.
pokedex_entries.shield: It’s forgetful and not very bright, but many Trainers love it anyway for its friendliness and sincerity.

pokedex_entries.black: When its internal fire flares up, its movements grow sharper and faster. When in trouble, it emits smoke.
pokedex_entries.white: Whatever it eats becomes fuel for the flame in its stomach. When it is angered, the intensity of the flame increases.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: The more it eats, the more fuel it has to make the fire in its stomach stronger. This fills it with even more power.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: The more it eats, the more fuel it has to make the fire in its stomach stronger. This fills it with even more power.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: When its internal fire flares up, its movements grow sharper and faster. When in trouble, it emits smoke.

pokedex_entries.black: They steal from people for fun, but their victims can’t help but forgive them. Their deceptively cute act is perfect.
pokedex_entries.white: Its cute act is a ruse. When victims let down their guard, they find their items taken. It attacks with sharp claws.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Their cute act is a ruse. They trick people and steal their valuables just to see the looks on their faces.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: Its cute act is a ruse. When victims let down their guard, they find their items taken. It attacks with sharp claws.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: They steal from people for fun, but their victims can’t help but forgive them. Their deceptively cute act is perfect.
pokedex_entries.sword: It steals things from people just to amuse itself with their frustration. A rivalry exists between this Pokémon and Nickit.
pokedex_entries.shield: Opponents that get drawn in by its adorable behavior come away with stinging scratches from its claws and stinging pride from its laughter.

pokedex_entries.black: This Pokémon appears in legends. It sends flames into the air from its tail, burning up everything around it.
pokedex_entries.white: When Reshiram’s tail flares, the heat energy moves the atmosphere and changes the world’s weather.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: This legendary Pokémon can scorch the world with fire. It helps those who want to build a world of truth.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: This legendary Pokémon can scorch the world with fire. It helps those who want to build a world of truth.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: When Reshiram’s tail flares, the heat energy moves the atmosphere and changes the world’s weather.
pokedex_entries.sword: Flames spew from its tail as it flies through the sky like a jet airplane. It’s said that this Pokémon will scorch the world.
pokedex_entries.shield: According to myth, if people ignore truth and let themselves become consumed by greed, Reshiram will arrive to burn their kingdoms down.

pokedex_entries.black: When Reuniclus shake hands, a network forms between their brains, increasing their psychic power.
pokedex_entries.white: These remarkably intelligent Pokémon fight by controlling arms that can grip with rock-crushing power.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: They use psychic power to control their arms, which are made of a special liquid. They can crush boulders psychically.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: They use psychic power to control their arms, which are made of a special liquid. They can crush boulders psychically.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: When Reuniclus shake hands, a network forms between their brains, increasing their psychic power.
pokedex_entries.sword: While it could use its psychic abilities in battle, this Pokémon prefers to swing its powerful arms around to beat opponents into submission.
pokedex_entries.shield: It’s said that drinking the liquid surrounding Reuniclus grants wisdom. Problem is, the liquid is highly toxic to anything besides Reuniclus itself.

pokedex_entries.black: Its ear is hexagonal in shape. Compressed underground, its body is as hard as steel.
pokedex_entries.white: They were discovered a hundred years ago in an earthquake fissure. Inside each one is an energy core.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: The hexagonal-shaped hole is its ear. It has a tendency to walk in the direction the sound is coming from.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: Its ear is hexagonal in shape. Compressed underground, its body is as hard as steel.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: They were discovered a hundred years ago in an earthquake fissure. Inside each one is an energy core.
pokedex_entries.sun: Born deep within the ground, it compares itself with similar species, such as Geodude and Carbink, to settle which has the hardest body.
pokedex_entries.moon: The hexagonal cavity is its ear. It walks in the direction of sounds it hears, but if the sounds cease, it panics and topples over.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: The hexagonal hole is its ear. Deep in that ear is an energy core, so if you stick your hand in there, Roggenrola will be very angry!
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: It was found in a fissure in a layer of exposed rock. The material that makes up its body is dirt from several hundred years ago.
pokedex_entries.sword: It’s as hard as steel, but apparently a long soak in water will cause it to soften a bit.
pokedex_entries.shield: When it detects a noise, it starts to move. The energy core inside it makes this Pokémon slightly warm to the touch.

pokedex_entries.black: They crush berries with their talons. They bravely stand up to any opponent, no matter how strong it is.
pokedex_entries.white: They will challenge anything, even strong opponents, without fear. Their frequent fights help them become stronger.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: It stands up to massive opponents, not out of courage, but out of recklessness. But that is how it gets stronger.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: They crush berries with their talons. They bravely stand up to any opponent, no matter how strong it is.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: They will challenge anything, even strong opponents, without fear. Their frequent fights help them become stronger.
pokedex_entries.sun: They pick fights indiscriminately. They grow stronger and more powerful each time they faint or are injured.
pokedex_entries.moon: With its sharp claws, this Pokémon pierces its prey, and then it pecks at them. Although it also consumes berries, it’s a carnivore at heart.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: With its powerful legs and sturdy claws, it can crack even the hard shells of Shellder and pluck out their insides.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: Known as a natural-born warrior, soon after its hatching, it will challenge its parent to a fight in order to gain their acceptance.
pokedex_entries.sword: If it spies a strong Pokémon, Rufflet can’t resist challenging it to a battle. But if Rufflet loses, it starts bawling.
pokedex_entries.shield: A combative Pokémon, it’s ready to pick a fight with anyone. It has talons that can crush hard berries.
pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: Its chick-like looks belie its hotheadedness. It challenges its parents at every opportunity, desperate to prove its strength.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: They pick fights indiscriminately. They grow stronger and more powerful each time they faint or are injured.
pokedex_entries.violet: With its sharp claws, this Pokémon pierces its prey, and then it pecks at them. Although it also consumes berries, it’s a carnivore at heart.

pokedex_entries.black: One swing of the sword incorporated in its armor can fell an opponent. A simple glare from one of them quiets everybody.
pokedex_entries.white: Part of the armor on its anterior legs becomes a giant sword. Its cry alone is enough to intimidate most enemies.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: In the time it takes a foe to blink, it can draw and sheathe the seamitars attached to its front legs.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: In the time it takes a foe to blink, it can draw and sheathe the seamitars attached to its front legs.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: One swing of the sword incorporated in its armor can fell an opponent. A simple glare from one of them quiets everybody.

pokedex_entries.black: They live buried in the sands of the desert. The sun-warmed sands prevent their body temperature from dropping.
pokedex_entries.white: It moves along below the sand’s surface, except for its nose and eyes. A dark membrane shields its eyes from the sun.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: They live hidden under hot desert sands in order to keep their body temperature from dropping.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: It moves along below the sand’s surface, except for its nose and eyes. A dark membrane shields its eyes from the sun.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: They live buried in the sands of the desert. The sun-warmed sands prevent their body temperature from dropping.
pokedex_entries.sun: It submerges itself in sand and moves as if swimming. This wise behavior keeps its enemies from finding it and maintains its temperature.
pokedex_entries.moon: It conceals itself in the sand and chomps down on the legs of any prey that unwarily walk over it. Its favorite food is Trapinch.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: Alola, where it’s warm all year round, is a comfortable environment for this Pokémon. Sometimes you’ll even see it outside of deserts.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: Sandile’s still not good at hunting, so it mostly eats things that have collapsed in the desert. It’s called “the cleaner of the desert.”
pokedex_entries.sword: The desert gets cold at night, so when the sun sets, this Pokémon burrows deep into the sand and sleeps until sunrise.
pokedex_entries.shield: Sandile is small, but its legs and lower body are powerful. Pushing sand aside as it goes, Sandile moves through the desert as if it’s swimming.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: It submerges itself in sand and moves as if swimming. This wise behavior keeps its enemies from finding it and maintains its temperature.
pokedex_entries.violet: They live hidden under hot desert sands in order to keep their body temperature from dropping.

pokedex_entries.black: The sound of Sawk punching boulders and trees can be heard all the way from the mountains where they train.
pokedex_entries.white: Tying their belts gets them pumped and makes their punches more destructive. Disturbing their training angers them.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Desiring the strongest karate chop, they seclude themselves in mountains and train without sleeping.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: Desiring the strongest karate chop, they seclude themselves in mountains and train without sleeping.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: Tying their belts gets them pumped and makes their punches more destructive. Disturbing their training angers them.
pokedex_entries.sword: If you see a Sawk training in the mountains in its single-minded pursuit of strength, it’s best to quietly pass by.
pokedex_entries.shield: The karate chops of a Sawk that’s trained itself to the limit can cleave the ocean itself.

pokedex_entries.black: They migrate according to the seasons. People can tell the season by looking at Sawsbuck’s horns.
pokedex_entries.white: The plants growing on its horns change according to the season. The leaders of the herd possess magnificent horns.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: They migrate according to the seasons, so some people call Sawsbuck the harbingers of spring.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: They migrate according to the seasons. People can tell the season by looking at Sawsbuck’s horns.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: They migrate according to the seasons, so some people call Sawsbuck the harbingers of spring.

pokedex_entries.black: With quick movements, it chases down its foes, attacking relentlessly with its horns until it prevails.
pokedex_entries.white: Highly aggressive, it uses the claws near its neck to dig into its opponents and poison them.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: It clasps its prey with the claws on its neck until it stops moving. Then it finishes it off with deadly poison.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: It clasps its prey with the claws on its neck until it stops moving. Then it finishes it off with deadly poison.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: With quick movements, it chases down its foes, attacking relentlessly with its horns until it prevails.
pokedex_entries.sword: Scolipede latches on to its prey with the claws on its neck before slamming them into the ground and jabbing them with its claws’ toxic spikes.
pokedex_entries.shield: Scolipede engage in fierce territorial battles with Centiskorch. At the end of one of these battles, the victor makes a meal of the loser.

pokedex_entries.black: Groups of them beat up anything that enters their territory. Each can spit acidic liquid from its mouth.
pokedex_entries.white: It can smash concrete blocks with its kicking attacks. The one with the biggest crest is the group leader.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: It pulls up its shed skin to protect itself while it kicks. The bigger the crest, the more respected it is.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: It pulls up its shed skin to protect itself while it kicks. The bigger the crest, the more respected it is.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: It can smash concrete blocks with its kicking attacks. The one with the biggest crest is the group leader.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: This Pokémon may be rude, but it takes very good care of its family, its friends, and its turf.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: It taunts its opponents by spitting. It has a certain territory that it never leaves its whole life long.
pokedex_entries.sword: As halfhearted as this Pokémon’s kicks may seem, they pack enough power to shatter Conkeldurr’s concrete pillars.
pokedex_entries.shield: While mostly known for having the temperament of an aggressive ruffian, this Pokémon takes very good care of its family, friends, and territory.

pokedex_entries.black: Its skin has a rubbery elasticity, so it can reduce damage by defensively pulling its skin up to its neck.
pokedex_entries.white: It immediately headbutts anyone that makes eye contact with it. Its skull is massively thick.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Proud of its sturdy skull, it suddenly headbutts everything, but its weight makes it unstable, too.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: Its skin has a rubbery elasticity, so it can reduce damage by defensively pulling its skin up to its neck.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: Proud of its sturdy skull, it suddenly headbutts everything, but its weight makes it unstable, too.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: They move in small groups, walking around lazily. Anyone who makes eye contact gets smacked with a headbutt.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: It stretches its saggy skin up to its neck to protect itself. The saggier their skin, the more respect they garner.
pokedex_entries.sword: If it locks eyes with you, watch out! Nothing and no one is safe from the reckless headbutts of this troublesome Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.shield: It protects itself with its durable skin. It’s thought that this Pokémon will evolve once its skin has completely stretched out.

pokedex_entries.black: They shoot paralyzing liquid from their head bumps. They use vibration to hurt their opponents.
pokedex_entries.white: It increases the power of its punches by vibrating the bumps on its fists. It can turn a boulder to rubble with one punch.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: By putting power into its bumps, it creates vibrations and increases the power of its punches.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: It increases the power of its punches by vibrating the bumps on its fists. It can turn a boulder to rubble with one punch.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: They shoot paralyzing liquid from their head bumps. They use vibration to hurt their opponents.
pokedex_entries.sword: The vibrating of the bumps all over its body causes earthquake-like tremors. Seismitoad and Croagunk are similar species.
pokedex_entries.shield: This Pokémon is popular among the elderly, who say the vibrations of its lumps are great for massages.

pokedex_entries.black: It can stop its opponents’ movements with just a glare. It takes in solar energy and boosts it internally.
pokedex_entries.white: They raise their heads to intimidate opponents but only give it their all when fighting a powerful opponent.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: It only gives its all against strong opponents who are not fazed by the glare from Serperior’s noble eyes.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: It only gives its all against strong opponents who are not fazed by the glare from Serperior’s noble eyes.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: It can stop its opponents’ movements with just a glare. It takes in solar energy and boosts it internally.

pokedex_entries.black: It moves along the ground as if sliding. Its swift movements befuddle its foes, and it then attacks with a vine whip.
pokedex_entries.white: They avoid attacks by sinking into the shadows of thick foliage. They retaliate with masterful whipping techniques.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: When it gets dirty, its leaves can’t be used in photosynthesis, so it always keeps itself clean.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: It moves along the ground as if sliding. Its swift movements befuddle its foes, and it then attacks with a vine whip.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: When it gets dirty, its leaves can’t be used in photosynthesis, so it always keeps itself clean.

pokedex_entries.black: Leavanny dress it in clothes they made for it when it hatched. It hides its head in its hood while it is sleeping.
pokedex_entries.white: This Pokémon makes clothes for itself. It chews up leaves and sews them with sticky thread extruded from its mouth.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Since this Pokémon makes its own clothes out of leaves, it is a popular mascot for fashion designers.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: This Pokémon makes clothes for itself. It chews up leaves and sews them with sticky thread extruded from its mouth.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: Since this Pokémon makes its own clothes out of leaves, it is a popular mascot for fashion designers.

pokedex_entries.black: When attacked, it defends itself by closing the lid of its shell. It can spit a sticky, poisonous liquid.
pokedex_entries.white: It evolves when bathed in an electric-like energy along with Karrablast. The reason is still unknown.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: When it and Karrablast are together, and both receive electrical stimulation, they both evolve.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: When it and Karrablast are together, and both receive electrical stimulation, they both evolve.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: It evolves when bathed in an electric-like energy along with Karrablast. The reason is still unknown.
pokedex_entries.sword: When attacked, it tightly shuts the lid of its shell. This reaction fails to protect it from Karrablast, however, because they can still get into the shell.
pokedex_entries.shield: It has a strange physiology that responds to electricity. When together with Karrablast, Shelmet evolves for some reason.

pokedex_entries.black: They never vary the route they fly, because their memories of guarding an ancient city remain steadfast.
pokedex_entries.white: The guardians of an ancient city, they use their psychic power to attack enemies that invade their territory.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: The guardians of an ancient city, they always fly the same route while keeping watch for invaders.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: The guardians of an ancient city, they use their psychic power to attack enemies that invade their territory.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: The guardians of an ancient city, they always fly the same route while keeping watch for invaders.
pokedex_entries.sword: Psychic power allows these Pokémon to fly. Some say they were the guardians of an ancient city. Others say they were the guardians’ emissaries.
pokedex_entries.shield: A discovery was made in the desert where Sigilyph fly. The ruins of what may have been an ancient city were found beneath the sands.

pokedex_entries.black: The tuft on its head holds water. When the level runs low, it replenishes the tuft by siphoning up water with its tail.
pokedex_entries.white: The high-pressure water expelled from its tail is so powerful, it can destroy a concrete wall.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: It prefers places with clean water. When its tuft runs low, it replenishes it by siphoning up water with its tail.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: The high-pressure water expelled from its tail is so powerful, it can destroy a concrete wall.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: It prefers places with clean water. When its tuft runs low, it replenishes it by siphoning up water with its tail.

pokedex_entries.black: Ill tempered, it fights by swinging its barbed tail around wildly. The leaf growing on its head is very bitter.
pokedex_entries.white: It attacks enemies with strikes of its thorn-covered tail. This Pokémon is wild tempered.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: It strikes its enemies with a thorn-covered tail. The leaf on its head is bitter.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: It attacks enemies with strikes of its thorn-covered tail. This Pokémon is wild tempered.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: Ill tempered, it fights by swinging its barbed tail around wildly. The leaf growing on its head is very bitter.

pokedex_entries.black: It loves sweets because they become energy for the fire burning inside its body.
pokedex_entries.white: A flame burns inside its body. It scatters embers from its head and tail to sear its opponents.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: When it gets excited, embers rise from its head and tail and it gets hot. For some reason, it loves sweets.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: A flame burns inside its body. It scatters embers from its head and tail to sear its opponents.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: When it gets excited, embers rise from its head and tail and it gets hot. For some reason, it loves sweets.

pokedex_entries.black: It is very intelligent and calm. Being exposed to lots of sunlight makes its movements swifter.
pokedex_entries.white: They photosynthesize by bathing their tails in sunlight. When they are not feeling well, their tails droop.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Being exposed to sunlight makes its movements swifter. It uses vines more adeptly than its hands.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: Being exposed to sunlight makes its movements swifter. It uses vines more adeptly than its hands.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: They photosynthesize by bathing their tails in sunlight. When they are not feeling well, their tails droop.

pokedex_entries.black: They drive away attackers by unleashing psychic power. They can use telepathy to talk with others.
pokedex_entries.white: Because their bodies are enveloped in a special liquid, they can survive in any environment.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Because their bodies are enveloped in a special liquid, they are fine in any environment, no matter how severe.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: Because their bodies are enveloped in a special liquid, they are fine in any environment, no matter how severe.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: They drive away attackers by unleashing psychic power. They can use telepathy to talk with others.
pokedex_entries.sword: It communicates with others telepathically. Its body is encapsulated in liquid, but if it takes a heavy blow, the liquid will leak out.
pokedex_entries.shield: Many say that the special liquid covering this Pokémon’s body would allow it to survive in the vacuum of space.

pokedex_entries.black: It rescues people stranded by blizzards in the mountains. Its shaggy fur shields it from the cold.
pokedex_entries.white: This extremely wise Pokémon excels at rescuing people stranded at sea or in the mountains.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Being wrapped in its long fur is so comfortable that a person would be fine even overnight on a wintry mountain.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: It rescues people stranded by blizzards in the mountains. Its shaggy fur shields it from the cold.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: Being wrapped in its long fur is so comfortable that a person would be fine even overnight on a wintry mountain.
pokedex_entries.sun: Intelligent, good-natured, and valiant, it’s a trustworthy partner on rescue teams.
pokedex_entries.moon: With this wise Pokémon, there could be no concern that it would ever attack people. Some parents even trust it to babysit.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: It pays no mind to the cold, thanks to its long warm coat. Stoutland in Alola look a little uncomfortable.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: Its fur is long and thick. A long time ago in cold regions, every household kept a Stoutland.
pokedex_entries.sword: These Pokémon seem to enjoy living with humans. Even a Stoutland caught in the wild will warm up to people in about three days.
pokedex_entries.shield: Stoutland is immensely proud of its impressive moustache. It’s said that moustache length is what determines social standing among this species.

pokedex_entries.black: Its skin is very hard, so it is unhurt even if stepped on by sumo wrestlers. It smiles when transmitting electricity.
pokedex_entries.white: It conceals itself in the mud of the seashore. Then it waits. When prey touch it, it delivers a jolt of electricity.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: When its opponent can’t be paralyzed, it contorts itself with unexpected speed and flops away.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: Its skin is very hard, so it is unhurt even if stepped on by sumo wrestlers. It smiles when transmitting electricity.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: It conceals itself in the mud of the seashore. Then it waits. When prey touch it, it delivers a jolt of electricity.
pokedex_entries.sword: Thanks to bacteria that lived in the mud flats with it, this Pokémon developed the organs it uses to generate electricity.
pokedex_entries.shield: For some reason, this Pokémon smiles slightly when it emits a strong electric current from the yellow markings on its body.

pokedex_entries.black: Forests where Swadloon live have superb foliage because the nutrients they make from fallen leaves nourish the plant life.
pokedex_entries.white: It protects itself from the cold by wrapping up in leaves. It stays on the move, eating leaves in forests.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Preferring dark, damp places, it spends the entire day eating fallen leaves that lie around it.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: Forests where Swadloon live have superb foliage because the nutrients they make from fallen leaves nourish the plant life.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: It protects itself from the cold by wrapping up in leaves. It stays on the move, eating leaves in forests.

pokedex_entries.black: Swanna start to dance at dusk. The one dancing in the middle is the leader of the flock.
pokedex_entries.white: It administers sharp, powerful pecks with its bill. It whips its long neck to deliver forceful repeated strikes.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Despite their elegant appearance, they can flap their wings strongly and fly for thousands of miles.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: Despite their elegant appearance, they can flap their wings strongly and fly for thousands of miles.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: Swanna start to dance at dusk. The one dancing in the middle is the leader of the flock.

pokedex_entries.black: It emits sound waves of various frequencies from its nose, including some powerful enough to destroy rocks.
pokedex_entries.white: Anyone who comes into contact with the ultrasonic waves emitted by a courting male experiences a positive mood shift.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: It shakes its tail vigorously when it emits ultrasonic waves strong enough to reduce concrete to rubble.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: It shakes its tail vigorously when it emits ultrasonic waves strong enough to reduce concrete to rubble.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: Anyone who comes into contact with the ultrasonic waves emitted by a courting male experiences a positive mood shift.
pokedex_entries.sword: Emitting powerful sound waves tires it out. Afterward, it won’t be able to fly for a little while.
pokedex_entries.shield: The auspicious shape of this Pokémon’s nose apparently led some regions to consider Swoobat a symbol of good luck.

pokedex_entries.black: It can deftly dodge its foe’s attacks while shooting fireballs from its nose. It roasts berries before it eats them.
pokedex_entries.white: It blows fire through its nose. When it catches a cold, the fire becomes pitch-black smoke instead.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: It loves to eat roasted berries, but sometimes it gets too excited and burns them to a crisp.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: It can deftly dodge its foe’s attacks while shooting fireballs from its nose. It roasts berries before it eats them.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: It loves to eat roasted berries, but sometimes it gets too excited and burns them to a crisp.

pokedex_entries.black: This Pokémon came to the defense of Pokémon that had lost their homes in a war among humans.
pokedex_entries.white: Its charge is strong enough to break through a giant castle wall in one blow. This Pokémon is spoken of in legends.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Spoken of in legend, this Pokémon used its phenomenal power to destroy a castle in its effort to protect Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: Its charge is strong enough to break through a giant castle wall in one blow. This Pokémon is spoken of in legends.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: Spoken of in legend, this Pokémon used its phenomenal power to destroy a castle in its effort to protect Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.sword: It has phenomenal power. It will mercilessly crush anyone or anything that bullies small Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.shield: In Unovan legend, Terrakion battled against humans in an effort to protect other Pokémon.

pokedex_entries.black: When it tightens its belt, it becomes stronger. Wild Throh use vines to weave their own belts.
pokedex_entries.white: When they encounter foes bigger than themselves, they try to throw them. They always travel in packs of five.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: When it encounters a foe bigger than itself, it wants to throw it. It changes belts as it gets stronger.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: When it tightens its belt, it becomes stronger. Wild Throh use vines to weave their own belts.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: When it encounters a foe bigger than itself, it wants to throw it. It changes belts as it gets stronger.
pokedex_entries.sword: It performs throwing moves with first-rate skill. Over the course of many battles, Throh’s belt grows darker as it absorbs its wearer’s sweat.
pokedex_entries.shield: They train in groups of five. Any member that can’t keep up will discard its belt and leave the group.

pokedex_entries.black: Countless charred remains mar the landscape of places through which Thundurus has passed.
pokedex_entries.white: The spikes on its tail discharge immense bolts of lightning. It flies around the Unova region firing off lightning bolts.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: As it flies around, it shoots lightning all over the place and causes forest fires. It is therefore disliked.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: The spikes on its tail discharge immense bolts of lightning. It flies around the Unova region firing off lightning bolts.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: As it flies around, it shoots lightning all over the place and causes forest fires. It is therefore disliked.
pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: They say this wielder of electricity has waged war with its nemesis, Tornadus, since time immemorial. The lightning bolts it hurls pierce the very earth and enrich the soil.

pokedex_entries.black: It fights by swinging a piece of lumber around. It is close to evolving when it can handle the lumber without difficulty.
pokedex_entries.white: These Pokémon appear at building sites and help out with construction. They always carry squared logs.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Always carrying squared logs, they help out with construction. As they grow, they carry bigger logs.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: These Pokémon appear at building sites and help out with construction. They always carry squared logs.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: Always carrying squared logs, they help out with construction. As they grow, they carry bigger logs.
pokedex_entries.sword: It loves helping out with construction projects. It loves it so much that if rain causes work to halt, it swings its log around and throws a tantrum.
pokedex_entries.shield: Timburr that have started carrying logs that are about three times their size are nearly ready to evolve.

pokedex_entries.black: Restored from a fossil, this Pokémon can dive to depths beyond half a mile.
pokedex_entries.white: About 100 million years ago, these Pokémon swam in oceans. It is thought they also went on land to attack prey.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: This Pokémon was restored from a fossil. It swam skillfully and dove to depths beyond half a mile.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: About 100 million years ago, these Pokémon swam in oceans. It is thought they also went on land to attack prey.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: Restored from a fossil, this Pokémon can dive to depths beyond half a mile.
pokedex_entries.sun: Based on studies of its skeletal structure, it can apparently dive to ocean depths of over half a mile.
pokedex_entries.moon: Reputed to be the ancestor of most turtle Pokémon, it lived in warm seas approximately a hundred million years ago.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: It was restored from an ancient fossil. Tirtouga lived in the sea but came up onto the land to search for prey.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: Its hunting grounds encompassed a broad area, from the land to more than half a mile deep in the ocean.
pokedex_entries.sword: This Pokémon inhabited ancient seas. Although it can only crawl, it still comes up onto land in search of prey.
pokedex_entries.shield: Tirtouga is considered to be the ancestor of many turtle Pokémon. It was restored to life from a fossil.

pokedex_entries.black: The lower half of its body is wrapped in a cloud of energy. It zooms through the sky at 200 mph.
pokedex_entries.white: Tornadus expels massive energy from its tail, causing severe storms. Its power is great enough to blow houses away.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: In every direction it flies, creating winds so powerful, they blow everything away.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: The lower half of its body is wrapped in a cloud of energy. It zooms through the sky at 200 mph.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: Tornadus expels massive energy from its tail, causing severe storms. Its power is great enough to blow houses away.
pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: This storm-stirring Pokémon is said to cause the seasons to turn by whipping up the air. I suspect its humanlike form to be a false one.

pokedex_entries.black: It can return to its Trainer’s location regardless of the distance separating them.
pokedex_entries.white: Many people believe that, deep in the forest where Tranquill live, there is a peaceful place where there is no war.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: No matter where in the world it goes, it knows where its nest is, so it never gets separated from its Trainer.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: Many people believe that, deep in the forest where Tranquill live, there is a peaceful place where there is no war.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: No matter where in the world it goes, it knows where its nest is, so it never gets separated from its Trainer.
pokedex_entries.sword: It can fly moderately quickly. No matter how far it travels, it can always find its way back to its master and its nest.
pokedex_entries.shield: These bright Pokémon have acute memories. Apparently delivery workers often choose them as their partners.

pokedex_entries.black: Inhaling the gas they belch will make you sleep for a week. They prefer unsanitary places.
pokedex_entries.white: The combination of garbage bags and industrial waste caused the chemical reaction that created this Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Wanting more garbage, they follow people who litter. They always belch poison gas.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: The combination of garbage bags and industrial waste caused the chemical reaction that created this Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: Inhaling the gas they belch will make you sleep for a week. They prefer unsanitary places.
pokedex_entries.sun: Unsanitary places are what they like best. They can be spotted in Alola, often with Grimer in hot pursuit.
pokedex_entries.moon: It gorges on trash until its stomach is full. Then it belches toxic gas. An unlucky whiff of gas will put a person in the hospital.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: Poisonous gas leaks out of it when it breathes. Muk that catch a whiff of that stench will come drooling.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: If a young Pokémon or child breathes in the toxic gas that Trubbish belches out, it could be a life-threatening situation.
pokedex_entries.sword: Its favorite places are unsanitary ones. If you leave trash lying around, you could even find one of these Pokémon living in your room.
pokedex_entries.shield: This Pokémon was born from a bag stuffed with trash. Galarian Weezing relish the fumes belched by Trubbish.

pokedex_entries.black: They warn others of danger by vibrating their cheeks to create a high-pitched sound.
pokedex_entries.white: By vibrating its cheeks, it emits sound waves imperceptible to humans. It uses the rhythm of these sounds to talk.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: By vibrating its cheeks, it emits sound waves imperceptible to humans and warns others of danger.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: By vibrating its cheeks, it emits sound waves imperceptible to humans and warns others of danger.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: By vibrating its cheeks, it emits sound waves imperceptible to humans. It uses the rhythm of these sounds to talk.
pokedex_entries.sword: Graceful ripples running across the water’s surface are a sure sign that Tympole are singing in high-pitched voices below.
pokedex_entries.shield: It uses sound waves to communicate with others of its kind. People and other Pokémon species can’t hear its cries of warning.

pokedex_entries.black: While one alone doesn’t have much power, a chain of many Tynamo can be as powerful as lightning.
pokedex_entries.white: These Pokémon move in schools. They have an electricity-generating organ, so they discharge electricity if in danger.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: One alone can emit only a trickle of electricity, so a group of them gathers to unleash a powerful electric shock.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: While one alone doesn’t have much power, a chain of many Tynamo can be as powerful as lightning.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: One alone can emit only a trickle of electricity, so a group of them gathers to unleash a powerful electric shock.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: While one alone doesn’t have much power, a chain of many Tynamo can be as powerful as lightning.
pokedex_entries.violet: These Pokémon move in schools. They have an electricity-generating organ, so they discharge electricity if in danger.

pokedex_entries.black: Males swing their head plumage to threaten opponents. The females’ flying abilities surpass those of the males.
pokedex_entries.white: Males have plumage on their heads. They will never let themselves feel close to anyone other than their Trainers.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Males swing the plumage on their heads to threaten others, but females are better at flying.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: Males swing their head plumage to threaten opponents. The females’ flying abilities surpass those of the males.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: Males have plumage on their heads. They will never let themselves feel close to anyone other than their Trainers.

pokedex_entries.black: Snowy mountains are this Pokémon’s habitat. During an ancient ice age, they moved to southern areas.
pokedex_entries.white: It conceals itself from enemy eyes by creating many small ice particles and hiding among them.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: They cool down the surrounding air and create ice particles, which they use to freeze their foes.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: They cool down the surrounding air and create ice particles, which they use to freeze their foes.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: Snowy mountains are this Pokémon’s habitat. During an ancient ice age, they moved to southern areas.
pokedex_entries.sun: Hot days cause its body to melt. It can be restored by refreezing it, but the process leaves its body slightly warped.
pokedex_entries.moon: This Pokémon has existed since the Ice Age. It controls particles of ice, freezes its opponents, and then shatters them with a headbutt.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: It sprays its enemies with grains of ice to freeze them. Most Vanillish in Alola are smaller than average.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: This hearty Pokémon survived the Ice Age. It’s incredibly popular in very hot regions.
pokedex_entries.sword: By drinking pure water, it grows its icy body. This Pokémon can be hard to find on days with warm, sunny weather.
pokedex_entries.shield: It blasts enemies with cold air reaching −148 degrees Fahrenheit, freezing them solid. But it spares their lives afterward—it’s a kind Pokémon.

pokedex_entries.black: The temperature of their breath is -58° F. They create snow crystals and make snow fall in the areas around them.
pokedex_entries.white: This Pokémon formed from icicles bathed in energy from the morning sun. It sleeps buried in snow.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Theoretically, this Pokémon formed from icicles bathed in energy from the morning sun. Their breath is -58° F.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: The temperature of their breath is -58 degrees Fahrenheit. They create snow crystals and make snow fall in the areas around them.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: This Pokémon formed from icicles bathed in energy from the morning sun. It sleeps buried in snow.
pokedex_entries.sun: Born of an icicle, this Pokémon uses its frosty breath to make ice crystals, causing snow to fall.
pokedex_entries.moon: It feels pleasantly cool when embraced. This Pokémon is treasured by households in warm regions.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: It exhales cold air that is at –58 degrees Fahrenheit. When it’s in a warm place, it shrinks little by little.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: When the morning sun hit an icicle, it wished not to melt, and thus Vanillite was born. At night, it buries itself in snow to sleep.
pokedex_entries.sword: Unable to survive in hot areas, it makes itself comfortable by breathing out air cold enough to cause snow. It burrows into the snow to sleep.
pokedex_entries.shield: Supposedly, this Pokémon was born from an icicle. It spews out freezing air at −58 degrees Fahrenheit to make itself more comfortable.

pokedex_entries.black: Swallowing large amounts of water, they make snow clouds inside their bodies and attack their foes with violent blizzards.
pokedex_entries.white: If both heads get angry simultaneously, this Pokémon expels a blizzard, burying everything in snow.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Swallowing large amounts of water, they make snow clouds inside their bodies and, when angry, cause violent blizzards.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: If both heads get angry simultaneously, this Pokémon expels a blizzard, burying everything in snow.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: Swallowing large amounts of water, they make snow clouds inside their bodies and, when angry, cause violent blizzards.
pokedex_entries.sun: Each of its two heads has a brain, and when they are in agreement, it attacks its enemies by exhaling a violent blizzard.
pokedex_entries.moon: Even if it loses one of its heads, it can live relatively problem-free. It makes snow clouds inside its body.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: It blasts blizzards from its two mouths. It can create snow anywhere, so it gets a lot of love from skiers and snowboarders.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: Vanilluxe is born when two Vanillish, half-melted by the day’s light, stick to each other and freeze together in the cold return of night.
pokedex_entries.sword: When its anger reaches a breaking point, this Pokémon unleashes a fierce blizzard that freezes every creature around it, be they friend or foe.
pokedex_entries.shield: People believe this Pokémon formed when two Vanillish stuck together. Its body temperature is roughly 21 degrees Fahrenheit.

pokedex_entries.black: Its bite injects a potent poison, enough to paralyze large bird Pokémon that try to prey on it.
pokedex_entries.white: It discovers what is going on around it by using the feelers on its head and tail. It is brutally aggressive.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Using the feelers on its head and tail, it picks up vibrations in the air to determine its prey’s location and state.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: It discovers what is going on around it by using the feelers on its head and tail. It is brutally aggressive.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: Its bite injects a potent poison, enough to paralyze large bird Pokémon that try to prey on it.
pokedex_entries.sword: Venipede and Sizzlipede are similar species, but when the two meet, a huge fight ensues.
pokedex_entries.shield: Its fangs are highly venomous. If this Pokémon finds prey it thinks it can eat, it leaps for them without any thought of how things might turn out.

pokedex_entries.black: This Pokémon brings victory. It is said that Trainers with Victini always win, regardless of the type of encounter.
pokedex_entries.white: It creates an unlimited supply of energy inside its body, which it shares with those who touch it.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: When it shares the infinite energy it creates, that being’s entire body will be overflowing with power.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: This Pokémon brings victory. It is said that Trainers with Victini always win, regardless of the type of encounter.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: When it shares the infinite energy it creates, that being’s entire body will be overflowing with power.

pokedex_entries.black: This Pokémon fought humans in order to protect its friends. Legends about it continue to be passed down.
pokedex_entries.white: Its head sprouts horns as sharp as blades. Using whirlwind-like movements, it confounds and swiftly cuts opponents.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Legends say this Pokémon confounded opponents with its swift movements.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: Its head sprouts horns as sharp as blades. Using whirlwind-like movements, it confounds and swiftly cuts opponents.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: Legends say this Pokémon confounded opponents with its swift movements.
pokedex_entries.sword: A legend tells of this Pokémon working together with Cobalion and Terrakion to protect the Pokémon of the Unova region.
pokedex_entries.shield: It darts around opponents with a flurry of quick movements, slicing them up with its horns.

pokedex_entries.black: When volcanic ash darkened the atmosphere, it is said that Volcarona’s fire provided a replacement for the sun.
pokedex_entries.white: A sea of fire engulfs the surroundings of their battles, since they use their six wings to scatter their ember scales.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Thought to be an embodiment of the sun, it appeared during a bitterly cold winter and saved Pokémon from freezing.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: A sea of fire engulfs the surroundings of their battles, since they use their six wings to scatter their ember scales.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: When volcanic ash darkened the atmosphere, it is said that Volcarona’s fire provided a replacement for the sun.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: As it flies, it scatters its flaming scales. It was feared by ancient people, who referred to it as “the rage of the sun.”
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: According to legends, it was hatched from a flaming cocoon to save people and Pokémon that were suffering from the cold.
pokedex_entries.sword: Volcarona scatters burning scales. Some say it does this to start fires. Others say it’s trying to rescue those that suffer in the cold.
pokedex_entries.shield: This Pokémon emerges from a cocoon formed of raging flames. Ancient murals depict Volcarona as a deity of fire.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: Its burning body causes it to be unpopular in hot parts of the world, but in cold ones, Volcarona is revered as an embodiment of the sun.
pokedex_entries.violet: This Pokémon scatters burning scales. Most of the danger of these scales is not in their heat—it’s in the way they rob the surrounding air of oxygen.

pokedex_entries.black: Its wings are too tiny to allow it to fly. As the time approaches for it to evolve, it discards the bones it was wearing.
pokedex_entries.white: They tend to guard their posteriors with suitable bones they have found. They pursue weak Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Their wings are too tiny to allow them to fly. They guard their posteriors with bones that were gathered by Mandibuzz.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: Its wings are too tiny to allow it to fly. As the time approaches for it to evolve, it discards the bones it was wearing.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: Their wings are too tiny to allow them to fly. They guard their posteriors with bones that were gathered by Mandibuzz.
pokedex_entries.sun: It protects its plump posterior with the bones of prey it has consumed. As it grows, it replaces the bones.
pokedex_entries.moon: It can’t fly yet and must wait until its wings have developed more. Since it’s still at a playful age, it hops around friskily.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: Mandibuzz gives it the bones it wears. Vullaby’s wings are short, so it can’t fly yet, but it jumps around, dreaming of wide open skies.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: Its healthy appetite leads to visible growth spurts. It often has to replace the bones it wears as its size increases.
pokedex_entries.sword: It wears a bone to protect its rear. It often squabbles with others of its kind over particularly comfy bones.
pokedex_entries.shield: Vullaby grow quickly. Bones that have gotten too small for older Vullaby to wear often get passed down to younger ones in the nest.

pokedex_entries.black: When they see an enemy, their tails stand high, and they spit the seeds of berries stored in their cheek pouches.
pokedex_entries.white: They make the patterns on their bodies shine in order to threaten predators. Keen eyesight lets them see in the dark.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Using luminescent matter, it makes its eyes and body glow and stuns attacking opponents.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: Using luminescent matter, it makes its eyes and body glow and stuns attacking opponents.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: When they see an enemy, their tails stand high, and they spit the seeds of berries stored in their cheek pouches.

pokedex_entries.black: Like the wind, it can slip through any gap, no matter how small. It leaves balls of white fluff behind.
pokedex_entries.white: Riding whirlwinds, they appear. These Pokémon sneak through gaps into houses and cause all sorts of mischief.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: They appear along with whirlwinds. They pull pranks, such as moving furniture and leaving balls of cotton in homes.
pokedex_entries.xomega_ruby: They appear along with whirlwinds. They pull pranks, such as moving furniture and leaving balls of cotton in homes.
pokedex_entries.yalpha_sapphire: Like the wind, it can slip through any gap, no matter how small. It leaves balls of white fluff behind.
